metadata.title: CVE-2024-36955 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:hda: intel-sdw-acpi: fix usage of device_get_named_child_node() Thedocumentation for device_get_named_child_node() mentions this importantpoint: " The caller is responsible for calling fwnode_handle_put() on thereturned fwnode pointer. " Add fwnode_handle_put() to avoid a leakedreference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
